metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5881 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash component infrastructure in YUI 2.4.0 through 2.9.0 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to charts.swf, a similar issue to CVE-2010-4207.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5881` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-yui - 2.9.0.dfsg.0.1-0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: jdstrand> maas uses an embedded copy of yui 3.4.1 in 12.04 and portions of yui3 in 12.10 and higher per upstream, yui3 not affected

criterions.comment: yui package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.0.dfsg.0.1-0.1').
